text: (muham'mad nabiyil) viśvasiccavarēā, yahūdamataṁ svīkariccavarēā, kraistavarēā, sābikaḷēā ārākaṭṭe, allāhuviluṁ antyadinattiluṁ viśvasikkukayuṁ, salkarm'maṁ pravarttikkukayuṁ ceytiṭṭuḷḷavarkk avaruṭe rakṣitāviṅkal avar arhikkunna pratiphalamuṇṭ‌. avarkk bhayappeṭēṇṭatilla. avar duḥkhikkēṇṭi varikayumilla
